linesContent.text: Grenade Hits proc Chaotic Exchange, granting
Additional Base Grenade Regeneration Rate for 1.75 seconds.
手雷命中会触发混沌交易，为你提供
额外基础手榴弹充能速率 1.75 秒。
Buff is refreshed on Weapon Kill or Grenade Kill. Grenade Kills grant 5 stacks.
增益持续时间可在击杀时刷新。手雷击杀直接获得 5 层增益。
Timer starts as soon as the ADS input is pressed.
Incurs a 3.1 seconds cooldown after firing.
开火后触发 3.1 秒冷却时间。
[PVE] 15% Body Shot Damage Increase. Precision Damage Increase varies depending on Precision Multiplier.
After Dodging within 15 metres of an Enemy:
You can dodge an unlimited amount of times for 6 seconds.
Can dodge up to 6 times per activation.
Rank-and-File Combatants spawn a Medium Stasis Crystal.
Incurs a 5 second cooldown if 5 Stasis Crystals are simultaneously active.
普通敌人生成中型水晶，高阶敌人生成大型水晶。
生成 5 块水晶后将进入 5 秒冷却。
Special and Power Weapons have a 20% chance to refund ammo.
Damage against Combatants is multiplied by 1.3x, then multiplied again by Combatant Rank Modifiers.
Grants Shielded buff and applies 40 Slow Stacks to Combatants within 7 metres.
• Lasts 20 seconds and grants a 100HP Overshield with 62.5% Damage Resist in PVE.
• Shielded prevents sprinting, double jumping, and sliding.
Only active for the first shot
Incurs a 0.3 second cooldown after activation but can be reactivated multiple times during a slide by shooting quickly.
Effect increases linearly as health decreases
隐身持续时间（使用终结技的效果）：
精英敌人/守护者 = 9.8 秒 （12.7）
Effects are halved on Fusion Rifles.
该特性对融合步枪的效果减半。
Effect increases linearly as health decreases
(Wolfpack Rounds can activate is a second time)
Does not stack with Chaos Accelerant's Bonus.
Tracking persists for 1 second after not aiming at the enemy.
20% Increased Damage and 15 Handling for 7 seconds.
+20% 伤害，+15 操控性，持续 7 秒。
4 second cooldown after buff expires. Can be activated while stowed.
Any Powered Melee which requires sprinting, sliding, or performs a slam will not activate Blunt Execution Rounds.
4 秒冷却时间。武器在收起时也可触发。
需要冲刺或滑行的充能近战以及弹道猛击均不会触发该特性。
Dealing additional Non-Precision Damage refreshes the timer.
造成非精准伤害将刷新计时器。
• 14% Increased Explosion Damage. Explosion Length and Width are increased to 14 metres.
• Explosion no longer deals self-damage and has no damage falloff.
• Increases Tripmine Durability to 100 HP with 50% Damage Resist.
• 爆炸伤害增加 14%。爆炸的长度和宽度增加到 14 米。
• 爆炸不再造成自我伤害，并且没有伤害衰减。
• 将感应手雷的耐久度提高到 100 生命值，并有 50% 的伤害抵抗。
~40 Stability, 55 Reload, and 0.56x Handling Animation Duration Multiplier.
Can be refreshed to up to 6.5 seconds.
该增益持续时间可以刷新，最长 6.5 秒。
Zoom acts as a multiplier to the hip-fire range falloff start and end distances while ADS.
In this case, it pushes out the weapon's effective range by 10%. This includes both damage and aim assist falloff.
Glaives, Grenade Launchers, and Trace Rifles share the ability gains of primary weapons.
Dealing Melee Damage grants +35 Handling for 3 seconds.
Being made invisible thanks to an Omnioculus Hunter grants
Kill while active add 4 seconds to the duration up to a maximum of 20 seconds.
Bosses are not finishable. Guardians share the effects of Elites.
击杀敌方守护者视为精英的效果。首领无法被终结。
敌人的等级分为普通敌人/精英/次级首领/首领。
Glaives, Grenade Launchers, and Trace Rifles share the ability gains of primary weapons.
Dealing Melee Damage grants +35 Handling for 3 seconds.
偃月、追踪步枪、榴弹发射器相较其他特殊武器，仅获得一半能量。
使用近战技能造成伤害获得 +35 操控性，持续 3 秒。将
Dodging grants Light Shift buff for 10 seconds.
Effect increases linearly as Health decreases. Maximized strength at Critical Health.
当生命值减少时，该效果线性提升，生命值降低到重伤时达到最高值。
Stasis: +20 Recoil Direction & 5% reduced ADS Movement Speed Penalty
冰影： +20 后座方向，降低 5% 瞄准时移动速度惩罚
Buff lasts until you are no longer at Critical Health, essentially serving as a Cooldown.
+10 Range, +10 Stability, and +10 Handling per stack.
每层增益 +10 射程，+10 稳定性，+10 操控性。
最高叠加 2 层，持续 15 秒。
Most weaken effects aside from Divinity can also activate it.
A 45 HP Void Overshield that provides 75% incoming damage resistance against PVE combatants.
大多数“虚弱”效果都可以触发该特性（神性除外）.
Unpowered Melee Attacks: 100% Increased Melee Damage.
Powered Melee Attacks: 40% Increased Melee Damage.
Bosses and Vehicles uniquely receive 25% increased melee damage. Bonus damage is multiplicative to the regular increase.
Overshield disappears instantly if you stop sprinting.
停止冲刺时覆盖护盾立即消失。
Can be refreshed to up to 6.5 seconds.
Weapon Kills must be within 5 seconds of each.
• 100% [PVP: 200%] Additional Base Class Ability Regeneration Rate.
• 100% [PVP：200%] 额外的基础职业技能充能速度。
Amount of Noble Seekers spawned is equal to Fireteam Size-1, with a minimum of 1 Seeker.
Each time a Noble Seeker applies a buff, the Rift Duration gets extended by 5 seconds.
产生的高贵追踪弹数量等于队伍人数减 1，最低为 1 个。
每当一个高贵追踪弹施加一个增益效果，裂隙的持续时间延长 5 秒。
Aiming Down Sights while Airborne grants Tome of Dawn.
（自身伤害的伤害量通常会提升 25%。）
Buff can be refreshed through additional reloads. Persists through stow.
增益持续时间无法被再次换单而刷新。武器收起时保持生效。
Buff is removed upon hitting a matching shield or an unshielded enemy.
29% per hit, up to 435%: Fusion Rifles
Auto Rifles, Machine Guns, Pulse Rifles, Trace Rifles
150% per hit, up to 450%: Linear Fusion Rifles
El bufo se termina si se impacta contra un escudo con mismo elemento, o contra un enemigo sin escudo.
+29% por bala, hasta 435%: Fusil de Fusion
Fusiles Automaticos, Fusiles de Pulsos, Fusiles de Rastreo y Ametralladoras
+150% por bala, hasta 450%: Fusiles de Fusion Lineales
Arcos, Gujas, Cañones de Mano y Fusiles de Explorador
当命中与武器元素匹配的元素护盾，或没有护盾的敌人时，移除伤害增益。
每次命中提升 29%，最高 435% ：融合步枪
自动步枪、脉冲步枪、追踪步枪、机枪
每次命中提升 150%，最高 450%：线性融合步枪
Solar Weapon Kills grant [?]% Class Ability Energy.
Additional Base Class Ability Regeneration Rate:
Fury Conductors grant Melee Damage Resist and increased
Arc Explosion damage based on the amount of stacks.
“狂怒导体能量”提供近战伤害抗性，并提升电弧爆炸的伤害量，根据叠加层数增多。
Buff is refreshed on Weapon or Melee Kill. Melee Kills grant 5 stacks.
Rank-and-File Combatants spawn a Medium Stasis Crystal.
Incurs a 5 second cooldown if 5 Stasis Crystals are simultaneously active.
Stacks up to 3 times. Buff is removed on stow.
|b Stacks |b Reload Speed |b Ready Speed |b Stow Speed
[PVP] Weapon Kills grant an additional 1% Super Energy.
Damage against Combatants is multiplied by 1.3x, then multiplied again by Combatant Rank Modifiers.
持续 7 秒，击杀可刷新。
刀剑获取更高的充能效率、防御抗性、防御耐性。
Passively grants +20 Handling and +20 Reload Speed.
被动属性提升：+20 操控性，+20 填装速度。
Does not work with Well of Radiance.
Effect at maximum strength removes all spread.
效果达到最高值时即完全没有子弹散布。
Incurs a 3.1 seconds cooldown after firing.
被动提升 +30 弹匣容量。
After 10 seconds: +15 Stability, +15 Handling and +15 Reload Speed. Displays as x2 buff.
Removes all stacks if movement speed is below 2 meters per second for 0.5 seconds.
All stacks are removed if criteria is not met for 0.5 seconds. Can activate and persist while stowed.
10秒后触发第二层增益：+15 稳定性，+15 操控性，+15 填装速度。
每 0.5 秒检测一次状态，若没有保持移动，则失去所有增益层数。
武器收起时也可触发和保持该增益。
reduced damage, and allies are granted
Passively grants +20 Handling and +20 Reload Speed.
Weapon fires the instant trigger pressure is applied.
On hit against Elite, Miniboss, or Boss Combatants:
Grants 20% increased damage per stack, up to 100% at 5 Stacks.
Consumes 1 stack per hit if at or below 5 stacks.
Consumes 5 stacks per hit if at or above 6 stacks.
PVE: 主武器：+20% | 特殊武器：+15% | 重型武器：+10%
PVP: 对激活超能的玩家：
[PVE] 15% Body Shot Damage Increase. Precision Damage Increase varies depending on the Precision Multiplier.
[PVP] Total damage remains practically the same.
Equipping two Special Weapons splits the amount of ammo granted between them.
装备两把特殊武器时，生成的弹药将平分给两把武器。
Damage against Combatants is multiplied by 1.3x, then multiplied again by Combatant Rank Modifiers.
该增益无法持续时间无法被刷新。
Moving too fast instantly ends the effect, even without swinging the sword.
Upon breaking a Combatant, Barrier, or Guardian Shield:
75% Additional Base Grenade and Melee Regeneration Rate
Healing Pulse heals for either 58 HP OR to 130HP.
The Healing Pulse heals for whichever value restores the most HP.
治疗脉冲治疗 58 点生命值，或者恢复至 130 点生命值。
取恢复血量更多的那个值。
Stacks with other Debuffs, as it is a Weapon Perk.
因其为武器特性，故可以与其他负面状态叠加。
Upon readying a Kinetic or Matching Hand Cannon with a Full Magazine:
60% increased damage per hit for 5.5 seconds. Maxes out at 600% after 10 Hits.
For Exotic Hand Cannon interactions, go to Court's Spreadsheet.
Damage from Jolt can be increased through Weapon Damage Increases, Debuffs, and Combatant Rank Modifiers. (The last only works against the Jolted enemy)
Removes Reticle Bounce on Controller inputs.
增益持续 1.5 秒，效果线性减弱。
The magazine refresh is increased to 17% on Submachine Guns and Auto Rifles.
冲锋枪和自动步枪的装填量为 17%。
Parting Gift has an additional effect based on Subclass:
• Solar: 40 Scorch (60 with Ember of Ashes)
• Stasis: Slows for 2 seconds and refreshes Slow Stacks. Does not apply Slow Stacks by itself.
• Void: "Lite" Suppress for 9 [PVP: 7] seconds [Does not apply to Guardians in Super]
• Damage Falloff Start and End Distance
Damage Falloff Multipliers do not apply to The Last Word, Shotguns, Sniper Rifles, and Fusion Rifles.
有效射程距离系数不会作用于遗言、霰弹枪、狙击步枪、融合步枪。
Weapon fires the instant trigger pressure is applied.
融合步枪仅获得上述数值
Increases overall damage by 17% at 50 Blast Radius Stat for Drum-Loaded Grenade Launchers.
Trace Rifles and Grenade Launchers grant half of what other Special Weapons give.
[PVE] 16% Increased Body Shot Damage. Precision Damage Increase varies depending on Precision Multiplier.
[PVE] 身体伤害提高 16%。 精准伤害将根据武器精准伤害系数变化。
Allies within 18(?) metres receive Feel The Flame.
Maxes out at 150% increased Magazine Capacity. Always rounds magazine up.
Primary Weapons: 20% Increased Magazine Capacity per Kill.
Puede llegar a ser un 150% la cantidad del cargador original. Redondea hacia arriba.
最高过量填加 50%，计算结果向上取整。
主武器：每个击杀过量填加 20%。
重武器：每个击杀过量填加 10%。

持续 5 秒，额外击杀增加 5 秒，持续时间上限为 8 秒。
